description: Generates rect with side len for educational visualization.
example_usage:
# Example usage for generate_rect_with_side_len
result = generate_rect_with_side_len(data)

educational_standards.description: Multiply side lengths to find areas of rectangles with whole-number side lengths for solving mathematical problems.
Solve real-world word problems involving areas of rectangles with whole-number side lengths
Solve mathematical problems involving perimeters of polygons.
Solve word problems involving perimeters of polygons.

educational_standards.display_name: Perimeter Problems: Finding the Missing Side
educational_standards.description: Solve perimeter problems in which the perimeter is given but a side length is missing.
Solve problems with rectangles with the same perimeter and different areas or with the same area and different perimeters.
Use rulers to measure objects in inches.
Find the perimeter of rectangles using formulas.
Find the area and perimeter of rectangles using formulas.
Find the area or perimeter of a rectangle when given another rectangle that has the same area or perimeter.

educational_standards.display_name: Multiplying Numbers by Breaking Them into Parts
educational_standards.description: Use the distributive property to break a one-digit × two-digit product into two simpler products [e.g., 7 × 26 = (7 × 20) + (7 × 6)] and add to find the result.

educational_standards.display_name: Setting Up Multiplication with Area Models
educational_standards.description: Represent a multi-digit multiplication as the area of a rectangle partitioned into smaller rectangles; label each partial area and add to obtain the full area (partial-products model).
Divide 2-digit numbers by 1-digit numbers using area models.
Compare two decimals to the hundredths place.
Multiply fractional side lengths to find areas of rectangles.
